name: doc-processor
description: Document Processor - Image to Insights OCR with Gemini AI

scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.install-deps: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000

author: Document Processor Team
